description: also known as Annatto. This prized hardwood is known as the the king of trees. Along with Mahogany, Teak is appreciated worldwide as a precious and beautiful hardwood ideal for crafting exquisite furniture.

No other wood shares Teak's exceptional strength and durability. Teak is a dense hardwood with high natural oil content, thereby repelling termites and moisture.   Multipurpose: you can use it to serve tea and enjoy your leisurely time alone or with your friends.serve snack, meals, to share quality time with your families.
